help: List of emergency messages to inject into the simulation
type: one of ADVICE, WATCH_AND_ACT, EVACUATE_NOW
broadcastHHMM : the time in HHMM format when this mesage is to be sent
broadcastZones: list of zones IDs to which this message should be sent

messages.content: Emergency services are attending to a fire north of Anglesea
13 vehicles are attending to the fire north of Anglesea
Bushfire north of Anglesea not under control yet
Waurn Ponds,789654,5764865,Evacuate now towards Waurn Ponds if safe to do so,Bushfire north of Anglesea is not contained
